title: Ecopolitan
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, All Raw
description: Non-profit ecological shop and 100% raw food restaurant built with non-toxic products. Supports sustainable living, education, local businesses and farmers. Uses purified water in food preparation. Shop sells juicers, dehydrators, books. Offers weekly lectures plus a monthly un-cooking classes offered followed by a raw vegan potluck - check its calendar.
